Description: Verify that the expected output for an empty input should be an empty string
Verify that the expected output for an SingleCharacter input should be a padded string
Verify that the expected output for string with mixed characters returns a soundex code
Verify that the expected output for too long string returns truncated soundex code
Verify that the output for string with numbers returns soundex code that ignores numbers
verify that the output for string with two similar letters returns soundexcode that ignores repetition
verify that the output for string beginning with numbers return a valid soundexcode
verify that the output for string with space returns soundex code that ignores space
verify that the output for string with special returns soundex code that ignores special characters
Verify that the expected output for Vowels input should be a padded string
